elite_levels.description: Can deploy a Reserve Water Cannon that lasts for 15s; the Water Cannon can attack 1 target and push it away slightly
Can deploy a Reserve Water Cannon that lasts for 20s; the Water Cannon can attack 1 target and push it away slightly
Increases the shift level of the Water Cannon's normal attacks and skills by 1, and Weedy will restore 1 SP per 3 seconds if the Water Cannon is located within 4 tiles of her
